headline: Cathie Wood Just Cut Her Position in an AI Stock That's Climbed 1,000% and Piled Into Shares of 2 Other AI Giants
summary: All three of these companies are seeing phenomenal growth thanks to demand from artificial intelligence customers.  Wood added shares of two of them to her portfolio at bargain prices.  Cathie Wood is known for two things: making daring investment moves that go against the crowd and doing this with a focus on the long term.

headline: AMD: Is It Time to Buy the Stock Before Its AI Growth Explodes?
summary: As the AI chip market begins to shift to inference, the company has a big opportunity.  When Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) reported its first-quarter results recently, it gave a glimpse into why some investors remain excited about the stock's prospects despite its poor performance over the past year.  This excitement stems from the revenue growth the company is seeing in its data center segment, where sales soared 57% to $3.7 billion.
